summary: Architecture review complete. JWT auth decision recorded, knowledge graph mapped. Ready for implementation of auth middleware, password reset, and rate limiting.

results.description: Identified missing authentication on all API routes

Mapped auth entities and relations in knowledge graph
Rate limiting and user DB schema still needed
